Job Description: We re looking for a fullstack (Laravel/Vue/Reactjs/Angular) developer to join our fully remote team. You should be proficient in Laravel and have deep knowledge of PHP, Laravel, and VueJS ecosystem. As our team member, you will be solving interesting problems from a simple websites to large scale saas applications where lots of technologies come together.    We take pride in building beautiful looking UI and proving you have the attention to detail to convert designs to perfect looking UIs will be a huge plus. Figma experience is a plus.    So, if you are a selfmotivated individual who likes to code not just for money, takes pride in his/her work, and understands the following technologies, we d like to hear from you.     KEY SKILLS      Min. 3 Year of experience    PHP Laravel (Auth, Eloquent, Service Providers, Routing, Validations, Middlewares)    Background commands and jobs experience using laravel    VueJS LaravelMix (Axios, Vue Router)    CSS3 (Bootstrap 3/4 or TailwindCSS)    MySQL/Mariadb/Procedures/mysql benchmarking, sacling big databse    Git Workflows (Branching, Pull Requests, Mergine, Resolving conflicts)    Basic understanding of how servers (LAMP) and clouds (AWS etc) work.    Must be proficient in MYSQL    Must know how to normalize data
